ComicInfo.Summary:
No more hiding. The new gods of Japan are on the attack and Tokyo is caught in the middle. JIM ZUB (SKULLKICKERS, SAMURAI JACK) and STEVE CUMMINGS (DEADSHOT) continue their acclaimed supernatural spectacle.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 1 | | B | Cover B | Vivian Ng | 2 |
